Monero contributor RandomRun realized our signatures could be made much smaller and faster. Sarang and I realized the construction could be used for multi-asset ringCT, AKA colored coins.  https://t.co/gI0dXVKSxp

In our recent work, we propose DLSAG: a new linkable ring signature scheme that enables for the first time payment channels and off-chain multi-hop payments in the @monero cryptocurrency. Paper available at  https://t.co/dA9E6G7Y6a Feedback welcome!

Monero Research Lab just added a preprint of their CLSAG (compact linkable spontaneous anonymous group) signature scheme to IACR. It features ~25% smaller and ~20% faster to verify transactions, all as a low-impact change.    https://t.co/BAZjkeYS7s
